# shouldDisplay

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the annotation should be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldDisplay: Bool { get set }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the annotation should be displayed; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

`PDFPage` respects this flag when drawing.

## Managing Annotation Drawing and Output

- **draw(with:in:)**: Draws the annotation in a graphics context using page-space coordinates relative to the origin of the specified box.
- **shouldPrint**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the annotation should appear when the document is printed.
